com.google.appinventor.components.runtime

Class NxtTouchSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.AndroidNonvisibleComponent
      • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.LegoMindstormsNxtBase
        • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.LegoMindstormsNxtSensor
          • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.NxtTouchSensor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BluetoothConnectionListener, Component, Deleteable

    public class NxtTouchSensor
extends LegoMindstormsNxtSensor
implements Deleteable
    A component that provides a high-level interface to a touch sensor on a LEGO MINDSTORMS NXT robot.
    Author:
    lizlooney@google.com (Liz Looney)
